Html:
This control was a great find, thank you for the time/effort into creating and maintaining it.

That said, we have a DropDownCheckBox that has a DataSource set to a column in a DataView. The column is a DateTime (e.g. 2010-09-03 13:29:58). We have tried to format the value displayed in the drop down such that it looks like 03/09/2010 using DropDownCheckBox.DataTextFormatString = "{0:mm/dd/yyyy}" but it doesn't seem to format the values properly. Any suggestions or are we attempting to format incorrectly?
